variable.name: param
variable.expression: groovyScript("def result='';def params=\"${_1}\".replaceAll('[\\\\[|\\\\]|\\\\s]', '').split(',').toList(); for(i=0;i<params.size();i++){if(params[i]=='') return result;if(i==0) result += '\\n'; result+=' * @param ' + params[i]+((i<params.size()-1)?'\\n' : '')}; return result", methodParameters())
